revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR940N |revision=v1.x |series=N300 |fcc_date=06/28/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR940N,TE7WR941NXV4 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32BVSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40FTP-G5 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=54:E6:FC |oui_eth=54:E6:FC }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tplink.com/en/products/details/?model=TL-WR940N Product page]
The FCC ID is not valid. Additionally, there is a new FCC filing under ID: '''TE7WR940N''' :(IC ID: 8853A-WR940N) for this same model (but perhaps not the same version).
The device is the same as the [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v4.x]] (minus the antenna :configuration, '''N''' = integral antennas, '''ND''' = removable antennas).
The device uses an AR7240 (AR7240-AH1A) for the CPU and an AR9283. :While the device does have 3 antennas, it only has 2T2R capability (the left :and middle antennas appear to be used in a switched diversity configuration).
The default SSID is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' :is the last three octets of the WLAN MAC address.
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr940n ''TL-WR940N v1.0'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
==Images== ===From TP-LINK=== <gallery> File:TP-LINK TL-WR940N-01.jpg|front File:TP-LINK TL-WR940N-02.jpg|angled File:TP-LINK TL-WR940N-04.jpg|back </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]] ===Board shots=== <gallery> File:TP-LINK TL-WR940N v1 board top TQ.jpg|BQ, BL board top, shield removed File:TP-LINK TL-WR940N v1 shields down.jpg|under the shield closeup File:TP-LINK TL-WR940N v1 flash.jpg|Flash W25Q32BVSIG File:TP-LINK TL-WR940N v1 unreadable processor.jpg|unreadable AR7240 top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
